required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-dose Phase 1 Study of DBPR108 in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Dose-ranging, Single-dose Study of the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of DBPR108 in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being performed to assess the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetic (PK) and pharmacodynamic (PD) properties of single oral doses of DBPR108 in healthy male subjects.

detailed_description.textblock:
This study represents the first administration of dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) inhibitor DBPR108 to humans to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetic (PK) and pharmacodynamic (PD) properties following single oral doses in healthy subjects.
DPP4 is a validated drug target for the treatment of human type 2 diabetes. Objectives of the study will be to characterize the safety and tolerability of single doses of DBPR108; to characterize the single dose PK of DBPR108 in plasma and urine; to characterize the single dose PD of DBPR108 on glucose, glucagon, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 activity, and total and active forms of glucagon-like peptide-1 (GLP-1) in plasma levels and insulin and C-peptide in serum levels.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
primary_outcome.time_frame: Adverse events were collected from Day -1 (baseline) through the end of the study, up to Day 7.
primary_outcome.description: There were 4 mild adverse events observed during the course of study.

secondary_outcome.measure: Profile of Pharmacokinetics - Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve (AUC From 0 to Infinity)
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were used to determine the AUC from time 0 to infinity for DBPR108. The placebo group is not included in the table below; this outcome measure only evaluated the DBPR108 groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Profile of Pharmacokinetics - Observed Maximum Plasma Concentration (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were used to determine the Cmax for DBPR108. The placebo group is not included in the table below; this outcome measure only evaluated the DBPR108 groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Profile of Pharmacokinetics - Time of Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma samples were used to determine the Time of Maximum Plasma Concentration for DBPR108. The placebo group is not included in the table below; this outcome measure only evaluated the DBPR108 groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of Dipeptidyl Peptidase 4 (DPP4) Activities Between 48 Hrs Post Dose and 0 hr Predose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose (0 hr) and 48 hrs post dose
secondary_outcome.description: Change of plasma DPP4 activity at 48 hrs post dose from predose (0 hr). The values were computed as areas under the DPP4 activity-time curve using ANCOVA model, in which the unit of the activity is pmol/min.

intervention.description: DBPR108 capsules in four doses beginning at 25 mg and rising to 600 mg.
Matching placebo capsules in four doses beginning at 25 mg and rising to 600 mg.

group.description: Participants received either a single oral dose of matching placebo to DBPR108 25 mg, 100 mg, 300 mg, or 600 mg

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
